title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight Airbus H135 Helicopter Updated to v0.92
description:
In this video we will look at the update release for the Airbus H135 Helicopter. Several adjustments were made amongst them:

- changes to the flight model
- improvements for the auto pilot
- new functions/parts on the helicopter

Keep in mind that if you previously used a custom livery that it needs to be updated to make sure it also paints the new part of the helicopter correctly.

If you also want to give the helicopter a try you can download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/8970/airbus-h135-helicopter-project
